direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add elements to the bag but with different parameter counts.
Both methods involve adding elements to the bag, but one adds a single element while the other adds a collection.
Both methods modify the bag's state, one by adding and the other by removing elements.
Both methods involve modifying the bag's contents, one by adding and the other by removing a collection of elements.
Both methods modify the bag's contents, one by adding elements and the other by retaining only specified elements.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a bag to be initialized before performing operations.
Adding a collection of elements can be part of the setup before testing the add method.
Both methods involve checking the presence of elements in the bag, useful for assertions after adding elements.
